title: JIPMER Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 04 Project Research Scientist and Other Posts
description: Jawaharlal Institute of Postgraduate Medical Education and Research (JIPMER) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 04 Project Research Scientists, Project Technical Support, and Project Staff Nurse Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS, BDS, M.Sc Nursing, 12th, and GNM can grab this chance and apply for the JIPMER Recruitment 2025 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee,...
